product.name: Da Hong Pao Oolong
product.description: Our featured tea this month is the legendary Da Hong Pao (Big Red Robe) oolong from the Wuyi Mountains. This tea has a rich history dating back to the Ming Dynasty and is known for its exceptional rock mineral taste, deep amber color, and long-lasting sweet aftertaste.
